curated_text: Symbol: V. Year: 2023. Period: Q1. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: Litigation Visa’s, Contents VISA INC, CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS (UNAUDITED)—(Continued, Litigation U.S., the U.S. Court of Appeals, European Commission, Digital Wallets Investigation, the European Commission, EC, German ATM Litigation, EMV Chip Liability Shift, Visa, U.S. Department of Justice Civil Investigative Demand, the Antitrust Division of, the U.S. Department of Justice (Division, Civil Investigative, Division, Foreign Currency Exchange Rate Litigation, European Commission Client Incentive Agreements Investigation, Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition, Visa Inc., the U.S. Private Securities Litigation Reform Act, COVID-19, SEC, Contents Overview Visa, VisaNet, Diluted, European Union, Pismo Holdings, Pismo, Europe Retrospective Responsibility, Legal Matters, Interlink, U.S. International Visa Inc., International Visa Inc., TM, Paralympic Winter Games, • Interest, 37 Table of Contents Dividends, The Financial Accounting Standards Board, Company, Issuer Purchases, Shares Purchased, Mine Safety Disclosures, Visa International Service Association, Visa U.S.A. Inc., Visa Europe Limited, Bank of America, JPMorgan Chase Bank N.A., Offer Letter, Financial, the Interactive Data File, the Securities Exchange Act, VISA INC. Context excerpt: Competition Appeal Tribunal denied class certification in the two class action claims. Other Litigation Visa’s motion challenging jurisdiction in the class action regarding interchange on cross-border transactions and the Honor All Cards rule in Israel was denied. 26 Table of Contents VISA INC. NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS (UNAUDITED)—(Continued) Other Litigation U.S. ATM Access Fee Litigation On July 25, 2023, the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit affirmed the district court’s class certification decisions. European Commission Staged Digital Wallets Investigation On February 16, 2023, the European Commission (EC) notified Visa that the matter has been closed. German ATM Litigation On July 6, 2023, one of the challenges to the jurisdiction of the German courts was denied.
